title: Becoming Invisible
description: Becoming Invisible is the third book in a New Adult series about finding unexpected love and a woman’s fight for survival.Passion...Obsession...Love...Loss.When fire consumes the Carlisle’s home and an obsessed serial killer continues to hunt Nicole and her family, Dylan and Bradley realize the only way to keep them alive is to help them become… invisible.
author: Tiffany Carmouche
